dct_title_s: The countries of the ancient world exhibiting the probable settlement of the descendants of Noah
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Jewish miles" and "English Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, settlement areas of the descendants of the tribes of Israel.
Inset map: The distance between Asia and America is 80 miles, & during a great part of the year it may be crossed on the ice.
